property.name: Text
property.value:

Destroy all characters with X strength.

property.value:

Put the resource into its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.value:
UNIQUE HEXTILDA
TOIL AND TROUBLE

property.name: Subtype
property.value: insect, monstrosity

property.name: Text
property.value:
HIDEOUSLY HORRENDOUS HEX OF HELLISHLY HORRIFYING HATRED
COST: Pay 6. Destroy this card. Pick 6 characters.
EFFECT: Inflict 6 damage to each of the characters. Inflict 6 damage to all factions. All players remove 6 cards in their hand from the game. All players remove 6 cards in their discard pile from the game. All players remove the top 6 cards of their deck from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
TICKLE
COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card.
EFFECT: An opponent discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
PRESENT THE STAFF
COST: Pay 2. Deplete this card. Pick a character you control.
EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand if you can. If you do, X is its numeric cost. You may search your deck for a tactic with numeric cost X or less and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Reveal a face-down tactic you control.
You may deploy the tactic. Draw a card.
While this card is in your discard pile, when a card that provides at least [O] enters play under your control, you may pay 2. If you do, put this card into play under your control as a face-down resource.
FLIP UP: 1 [O]

property.name: Text
property.value:
When a player draws any number of cards, that player may add or remove a token from this card. If they do, generate the effect which corresponds to the new number of tokens on this card:
0 TOKENS: That player's choses an opponent to discard a card.
1 TOKEN: That player may look at the top 2 cards of their deck. If they do, they put 1 into their hand and 1 on the bottom of their deck.
2 TOKENS: That player may pick a character or location. If they do, put it into its owners's hand.
AT LEAST 3 TOKENS: That player may play a resource.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
PROVIDES: [O]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only in response to a tactic being deployed. Pay X, where X is its numeric cost.
Duplicate the tactic. Terminate the tactic.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
If you deployed this card using FLIP UP, it enters play with a token on it.
While there is a token on this card, it loses COVERT and gains 1 strength and 1 life.
If there are no tokens on this card and it would be destroyed, flip it face-down under its owner's control instead.
FLIP UP: 3 [O][O]

property.name: Text
property.value:

EFFECT: You may deploy a tactic with numeric cost X or less for free, where X is either 5 or the number of [O] you control, whichever is lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a card. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. Put this card into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource instead of into their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at an opponent's hand and pick a non-resource card in it. That player discards that card. You may pick a card of the same type as the discarded card. If you do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
If you deployed this card using FLIP UP, that character's controller discards 2 cards. If that character's controller has 3 or fewer cards in their hand, remove the character from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
An opponent discards a card. If you control [O][O][O], that player discards another card. If you control [O][O][O][O][O][O][O][O], that player discards another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a card that provides at least [O] enters play under your control, you may pick a character. If you do, it gains COVERT this turn.

property.value:

At the start of each turn, if there are at least 3 tokens on this card, an opponent takes control of it. Remove all tokens from this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of each turn, put the character with the lowest numeric cost into its owner's hand. If there is a tie, you decide which character is affected.

property.name: Text

While this card is in your hand you may reveal this card as you are playing a resource. If you do, you may deploy this card for 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may search an opponent's deck for a card. If you do, put it in the void face-down. For the rest of the game, when that opponent deploys a card, you may reveal the voided card if it has the same name. If you do, you may deploy it for free even if you cannot meet its threshold. If you deploy it, terminate the opponent's card. (Playing a resource does not trigger this effect.)

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, draw a card.
If this card would be destroyed, each player removes the top card of their deck from the game instead. If the numeric cost of your removed card is greater than or equal to the numeric cost of all opponent's, draw a card and reduce the amount of damage already inflicted to this card this turn to 0. Otherwise, remove this card from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:

COST: Deplete this card.

Reveal the chosen piles. If one pile has a higher total numeric cost than the other, the owner of that pile may put one of the cards from it into their hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into their owners's deck.

property.value: emperor barduse, dragon

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE EMPEROR BARDUSE
When this card enters play, you may pick any number of characters. If you do, inflict X damage divided however you want to the characters, where X is twice the number of dragon characters you control.
All your other "dragon" characters gain 1 strength and 1 life.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
The attached character gains 2 strength and 1 life.
If this card would be destroyed, flip it face-down under its owner's control instead.
SNICKER SNACK
COST: Use this only while this card is a face-down resource. Reveal this card. Pay 3. Discard a card. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the character. Inflict 1 damage to your faction.
